祈.definition: to implore; to pray; to request

祈仙台.definition: memorial altar; platform for praying to immortals

祈望.definition: to hope; to wish; hope; wish; (old) name of an official post

祈福禳災.definition: to pray for luck and sacrifice to avoid disasters (i.e. traditional superstitions)

祈禱.definition: to pray; to say a prayer

祈願.definition: to pray; to pray for sth; to wish sth; prayer; wish
